ul.li: Concatenate enum_val and chron_val with a comma and whitespace character.
Surround the concatenated value with square brackets.
Concatenate call_number and enum_chron_val with a whitespace character and save the value as call_number_2.
Concatenate call_number_2 with the location_name with a whitespace character.
Surround the extracted value with square brackets.
Save the value as enum_val or chron_val.
Concatenate call_number and enum_val or chron_val with a whitespace character and save the value as call_number_2.
If the holdings_val each with a comma, trim the comma from the end of holdings_val.
Concatenate call_number and holdings_val with a whitespace character and save the value as call_number_2.
